release.action: Upgrade to RDF2Go 4.7.3.
Fixed hasX(model,resource,value) - was ignoring the value
Removed @SuppressWarnings, as Eclipse now complains about these unnecessary SuppressWarnings.
Upgrade to RDF2Go 4.7.0.
Added generation of X.hasPPP( O ) to return true if there is a triple (x,p,o).
Removed unnecessary cast in generated code: getPPP_asNode().
Fixed typo in generated method name: getAllInstance_as( Model m ) --> getAllInstances_as( Model m )
Generate cleaner code: Added @SuppressWarnings to generated static URI fields.
removeAllPROP() was named addAllPROP() by accident.
Code beautification - removed all Eclipse warnings
Added vocabulary classes for Protege extensions and NRL cardinality
Added support to read Protege and NRL cardinality constraints
Switching some old code from apache.commons.logging to slf4j
Classes are now written out in alphabetical order. That makes it easier to verify the output.
Now generated classes have a method "static T getInstance( model, resource )"
Switched to Velocity 1.5 for better log handling

Worked around memory consumption of Velocity by re-initialising the context for each generated class. This reduced maximal memory consumption from 1.5 GB down to 250 MB for our largest test ontologies.
Upgraded to RDF2Go 4.6.
Refactored heavily. Added static methods for all property operations, so object creation can be avoided. Maybe 5% faster.
Improved overall quality of documentation
Now uses 'name' from URNs such as 'urn:ex:name'. Was using the whole URI before.
Fixed version-Id in generated code - now it's always current. By setting 'svn-keywords' to 'Id'.
Migration to RDF2Go 4.5.3 and RDFReactor.runtime 4.4.15.
Now property names are unique withing the inheritance hierarchy (was only within class before)
Migration to rdfreactor.runtime 4.4.12
Generation from OWL had a bug.
xsd:dateTime types now result in java.util.Calendat, not Date. This ensures always tim zone information, which is more precise.
Added tests.
Removed Jena compile time dependency - now any RDF2Go store with RDFS support can be used.
Migration to RDFReactor.runtime 4.4.10
Switched to and adapted to runtime 4.4.8.
Added tests.
Switched to runtime 4.4.7 to propagate bugfix.
Ability to handle multiple comments
Added removeAllPROPNAME and removePROPNAME to generated code
Aligned with RDF2Go/RDFReactor runtime 4.4.5 releases.
Now ignores owl:DeprecatedProperties
Added support for owl:cardinality
Split RDFReactor into two OSGi bundles
